questions.question: What is the dominant color displayed on the phone's screen?
What is the overall shape of the phone's body?
What appears to be the material of the phone's frame?
Describe the pattern visible on the phone's screen?
What color are the side bezels of the phone?
What is the apparent screen technology used (e.g., LCD, OLED)?
What is the primary color of the accent lines on the screen?
Is there a visible notch at the top of the screen?
What is the texture of the phone's back casing (if visible)?
What color is the secondary accent color on the screen?
Are there any visible buttons or ports on the sides?
What is the style of the phone's screen edges (curved/flat)?
Does the phone display a time on its screen?
What seems to be the finish of the phone's frame?
What type of display does the phone appear to have?
